author: agilliland
msg: themes need a link to custom stylesheet for it to work.

author: agilliland
msg: fix bug where stylesheet editor shows warning about no custom stylesheet available when the stylesheet action is being accessed for the first time on a given theme.  the bug was that the custom stylesheet template needs to be created at that point but wasn't being properly set so that it's available for the action execute() method.
